resources.string:
New Messier Object Icons

Deep sky objects now display distinct icons based on their type: galaxies, open clusters, globular clusters, diffuse nebulae, planetary nebulae, and supernova remnants. No more guessing what you\'re looking at!

Info Cards in Automatic Mode

You can now optionally enable info cards while using sensor-based pointing. Look for the new setting in Preferences to turn this on.

Moon Phase Angle Fix

The Moon\'s illuminated crescent now renders at the correct angle by properly accounting for Earth\'s axial tilt.

Edge-to-Edge Display Fix

Fixed an issue where content could be obscured by navigation bars on devices using gesture navigation.

Messier Catalog Improvements

Corrected data for several Messier objects and improved how object types are categorized.

Expanded Translations

  • Info cards now available in German, Japanese, Dutch, and Polish
  • Updated Greek translations
